Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.appliance

Class HomeAppliance

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.appliance.HomeAppliance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Appliance, Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
Computer, Dishwasher, Fridge, Kettle, Oven, Playstation, Sensor, Stove, TV, WashingMachine
public abstract class HomeAppliance extends Object implements Appliance
HomeAppliance is an abstract class that represents an appliance in a smart home.
